name: Farm with friends
description:
Farm with Friends

Farm with Friends is a relaxed farming game. You can grow crops, tame animals, build your town and summon residents to sell your items and craft more items.

Key Features:
  • Grow plants
  • Craft items
  • Build your town
  • Explore new places for resources
  • Tame animals
  • Customize your look and your Residents look
